name: Leventis, Appellant, v. Kaufmann Department Stores, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Leventis v. Kaufmann Department Stores, Inc.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Leventis, Appellant, v. Kaufmann Department Stores, Inc.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Marshall.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: J. Thomas Hoffman, with him William D. Hilldorfer, for appellant.
J. Roy Dickie and Dickie, Robinson é McCamey, for appellee, were not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Leventis, Appellant, v. Kaufmann Department Stores, Inc.
Argued March 26, 1947.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
J. Thomas Hoffman, with him William D. Hilldorfer, for appellant.
J. Roy Dickie and Dickie, Robinson é McCamey, for appellee, were not heard.
April 14, 1947:
